abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Financial
            Sector Adjustment Loan is to strengthen the
            government's capacity to manage the impact of future
            economic shocks on the financial system, promote the
            longer-term development and resiliency of the system, and
            enhance its contribution to the overall growth and stability
            of the Peruvian economy. The loan will support the
            implementation of a modernized bank resolution framework
            coupled with improved surveillance and prompt corrective
            actions, as well as finer-tuned rules for providing
            liquidity support to healthy banks. In addition, the loan
            will support reforms aimed at more systematic coordination
            of prudential supervision and crisis management across the
            banking, capital markets and pension sectors.
